name: Wyndham Grand Pittsburgh Downtown

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recently spent 3 nights in the underrated city of Pittsburgh staying at the Wyndham Grand Hotel. We had sent off a request a couple of months prior to our stay asking for a river view room and received a reply saying that whilst they couldn't guarantee a river view room, they would try their hardest. Our hopes were quickly dashed upon check in when the girl on the desk brusquely declined our request with 'well we do have two conventions staying at the hotel', suffice to say they know which class of guests take priority...not ours!
reviews.title: Can't really fault it

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: That initial gripe aside, it was difficult to find any real faults with the hotel. The room whilst not overly spacious was at least well equipped with modern decor and flat screen tv. The bed was very comfy thanks to a memory foam topper. The bathroom was a little small with the most powerful shower in the world though i must say that turning the thing on was a mission in itself as the fixed shower screen meant you had to actually get into the bath to turn it on resulting in a deluge of freezing cold water spurting out over you and the entire bathroom floor!
reviews.title: No shuttle, Noisy and smoky!

reviews.text: The hotel is basically still under construction = when that is finished I'm sure the rating will improve - so getting around was for our large event was just a little difficult - the waite staff at the banquet did a fantastic job
